skill.author: DennisLiuCk

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill with no code execution, file access, or network capabilities. It only defines AI agent workflows for systematic issue analysis. No security risks detected.

content.user_title: Analyze Issues with Five-Agent Systematic Approach
content.value_statement: Debugging complex issues often requires multiple perspectives and deep analysis. This skill orchestrates five specialized AI agents to systematically investigate problems, trace root causes, and provide actionable solutions.
actual_capabilities: Coordinates five specialized agents for comprehensive issue analysis
Automatically triggers conditional agents based on problem characteristics
Generates structured analysis reports with confidence scores
Supports parallel execution of diff and log analysis agents
Provides iterative root cause validation with evidence collection
limitations: Requires existing codebase access for code investigation
Analysis quality depends on problem description completeness
Maximum of 3 root cause hypotheses tested per session
Git history analysis limited to recent 1-2 weeks

use_cases.title: Production Issue Investigation
use_cases.description: Systematically analyze production bugs by coordinating multiple investigation approaches including code analysis, recent changes, and log examination.

use_cases.title: Incident Root Cause Analysis
use_cases.description: Quickly identify root causes of system incidents through collaborative agent investigation of logs, recent deployments, and configuration changes.

use_cases.title: Bug Report Analysis
use_cases.description: Deep dive into complex bug reports to understand failure patterns, identify code locations, and suggest targeted fixes.

prompt_templates.title: Quick Start Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze this production issue: [describe symptoms, error messages, affected users]. Use the systematic approach to find the root cause.

prompt_templates.title: Bug Investigation
prompt_templates.prompt: Investigate this bug: [describe behavior, expected vs actual, reproduction steps]. Help me understand what's causing it.

prompt_templates.title: Performance Issue
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze this performance issue: [describe degradation, timing, affected components]. Check recent changes and logs.

prompt_templates.title: Complex Multi-System Issue
prompt_templates.prompt: Debug this complex issue spanning multiple services: [describe interactions, failure points, dependencies]. Use all available agents.

output_examples.input: Users report login failures after yesterday's deployment. Error logs show 'authentication timeout' messages.
output: Root Cause: Database connection pool exhaustion in authentication service
Fix: Increase connection pool size from 10 to 50 connections
Recent Change: Deployment #1423 reduced pool size (commit abc123)

best_practices: Provide detailed problem descriptions including error messages, timing, and affected components
Include relevant log snippets and recent changes when available
Specify the environment and conditions where the issue occurs
anti_patterns: Avoid vague problem descriptions without specific error messages or symptoms
Don't skip providing context about recent changes or deployments
Don't expect analysis without access to the relevant codebase

faq.question: Which Claude tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Compatible with Claude Code and standard Claude. The skill uses Task tool for agent coordination.

faq.question: How many agents does it use?
faq.answer: Five agents: problem-analyzer, codebase-investigator, root-cause-finder, plus conditional diff-analyzer and log-analyzer.

faq.question: Can it analyze any codebase?
faq.answer: Requires existing codebase access through Claude Code. Cannot analyze remote or inaccessible code.

faq.question: Is my code data safe?
faq.answer: Yes, this is a prompt-based skill with no external data transmission. All analysis stays within your Claude session.

faq.question: What if no root cause is found?
faq.answer: Provides best hypotheses with evidence, identifies information gaps, and suggests additional data needed.

faq.question: How does it compare to manual debugging?
faq.answer: Provides systematic multi-perspective analysis faster than manual investigation, with structured reports and confidence scores.
